verbose_text: GS is a multifunctional enzyme at the center of N metabolism, which participates in the regulation of various N metabolism related reactions and is induced by increased NH 4 + supply [XREF_BIBR]; GS activity has been shown to be significantly and positively related to the ability to adapt to abiotic stress [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: metabolism, which participates in the regulation of various N metabolism-related reactions and is induced by increased NH
